meanings.definition: To become or make larger or more extensive.
meanings.sent1: The balloon started to expand as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to expand its business to new markets next year.
meanings.sent3: The garden seemed to expand magically overnight, with flowers blooming everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her love for painting continued to expand, filling her heart with joy.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline expanded before their eyes, reaching new heights of beauty.

meanings.definition: To open up, unfold, or spread out.
meanings.sent1: He watched the flower expand its petals in the morning sun.
meanings.sent2: The map expands to show more details when you zoom in.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella expanded suddenly, surprising everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The story expanded like a blooming flower, revealing new twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The music expanded through the room, filling every corner with its melody.

meanings.definition: To express at length or in detail.
meanings.sent1: She always expands on her ideas during class discussions.
meanings.sent2: The author decided to expand the final chapter of the book for more depth.
meanings.sent3: His explanation expanded so much that it became a mini-lecture.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement expanded into a full-blown speech about her favorite topic.
meanings.sent5: The painting expanded on the canvas, capturing every intricate detail of the scene.
